title: Slash commands
content: Source: https://docs.conductor.build/core/slash-commands Run custom commands within a chat Custom slash commands allow you to define frequently-used prompts as Markdown files that Claude Code can execute. ## Setting up slash commands Create custom commands by adding Markdown files to the `.claude/commands/` directory: Learn more about slash commands [here](https://docs.anthropic.com/en/docs/claude-code/slash-commands).
